item.title: Dotnet core 5 on a raspberry pi
item.author: sharrewijnen@live.com (Sander Harrewijnen)
item.description:
Here’s a quick get-up-and-go style post on how to get dotnet core 5 usable on a Raspberry Pi (a R-Pi 3 Model B in my case).

We’re doing all this over SSH because my goal was to run a small webapp on the Pi which is located in a cupboard somewhere in my house without a keyboard and mouse attached to it ğŸ˜ So, after you’ve connected to the Pi over SSH, the first step is to install the dotnet core SDK.
